TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ListCommandEventHandler(object sender, ListCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ListCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ListCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ListCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void ListCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ListCommandEventArgs ^ e);
type ListCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * ListCommandEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的來源，即 控制項。

span.span: The source of the event, a control.

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立委派控制項，識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create a delegate for a control, you identify the method that will handle the event. 時就會產生項目事件通知處理常式。The notifies the handler when an item event is generated. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除委派，否則每次發生事件時都會呼叫事件處理常式。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 預設呈現控制項提供 UI，可讓使用者可以按一下個別清單項目。For default rendering, the control provides a UI that allows the user to click individual list items. 在回傳時，控制項會呼叫事件處理常式，以指向原始項目的引數。On postback, the control calls the event handler, with an argument pointing to the source item. 屬性的值是 `null`。The value of the property is `null`. ASP.NET 的事件反昇機制呈現時的範本，呼叫方法。When rendering with a template, the event bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET calls the method. 事件處理常式會傳遞為參數，指到來源項目，以及產生事件之控制項的屬性。The event handler is passed a parameter, pointing to the source item, and to the property of the control that generated the event. 這可讓您呈現單一的清單項目使用多個關聯的互動。This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions. 若要轉譯為超連結的項目，您可以設定屬性設`true`。To render an item as a hyperlink, you can set the property to `true`. 值屬性用於顯示和內容屬性做為選取時，才會進行目標連結位址。The value of the property is used for display, and the contents of the property are used as the target link address when selected. > [!NOTE] > 命令事件不會產生這些連結。Command events will not be generated for these links.
